turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm really needing somee caffeine. Will you call and place an order for me to pick up please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course! Where would you like it from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Umm Starbucks sounds good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yeah they're great. Which city will you be in?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Port Huron so order it from the one on 24th Avenue in Fort Gratiot

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Perfect. And what would you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What do you usually get?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Well I reaelly like their blonde roast with just a little bit of hazelnut. I'm not a big specialty drink person. Do you feel like something complex or just some simple coffee?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah I'm feeling like treating myself so something a little complex.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I had their Cinnamon Dolce Latte before and it was really good

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ooh that does sound good, I'll try one too. And get one for yourself as well if you're nearby.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Aww well thanks. What size do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll take a grande. But get whichever size you want.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're too kind. Would you like anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No that'll be it, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok I just placed the order. It said the receipt would be emailed to you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great! Thanks so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Not a problem. So that'll be ready for you to pick up in 20 minutes at 426 24th Avenue in Fort Gratiot. Anything else I can help you with?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No that'll be it for now.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok I'll talk to you soon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok bye
